description.value:
Forging a close bond with other people brings out the best in you, making it easier for you to link your mind with theirs. Through bonding your psyche with another person, youâ€™re able to fill in your own mental gaps and develop new psychic powers.

Phrenic Pool Ability: Charisma

Bonus Spells: 

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.tjog6bufg5b08lvq]{Charm Person} (1st),
